description:
Sachiko is a classmate of http://anidb.net/ch145182 [Kusakabe Kanna]. She and http://anidb.net/ch148665 [Shingo], who secretely met at the old school building during nighttime, saw someone entering the school library. Upon examination they found out that the room was empty believing that they saw a ghost. She became afraid that she was cursed and is going to die so Kanna decided to help and find out the truth.
The "ghost" turned out to be http://anidb.net/ch145181 [Chuuzenji Akihiko], who hid himself in a secret room next to the school library.
name: Sachiko
